name: HolmanHome
0:
”Alexa, turn WX8 on”
”Alexa, turn off RGB Garden Light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
If you have any problems using this skill, contact us at service@holmanindustries.com.au 

Holman Home helps you control your garden products. You can simply ask Alexa to turn on or turn off your irrigation controller or garden lights.

There’s no need to go to each device to control your smart garden products - just talk to Alexa on your Amazon Echo, Echo Dot, Amazon Tap or Echo Show.

Connect Alexa to your Holman Home products in a few simple steps:

1. Download our "Holman Home" app from the Apple App Store or Google Play Store

2. Register for a "Holman Home” account

3. Setup your Holman Home products in our "Holman Home" app and edit the name of each device appropriately as it will be used in "Holman Home" skills

4. Download the Amazon "Alexa" app from the Apple App Store or Google Play Store

5. Configure your Echo with the "Alexa" app

6. Search for the "Holman Home" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category

7. Enable the "Holman Home" skill and you'll be navigated to the Holman Home login page

8. Enter your Holman Home account details

9. Discover your devices and then you are ready to control them

You can enjoy voice controlling your Holman Home products by asking:

“Alexa, turn WX8 on”
“Alexa, turn off RGB Garden Light”
“Alexa, brighten the RGB Garden Light”
“Alexa, dim the RGB Garden Light”
“Alexa, set the RGB Garden Light to green.”
